December 19, 2014Joon Ki Choi Reading time ~1 minute

Install Node and NPM without sudo

Recently i stuck at an error:”npm ERR! Error: EACCES, mkdir…” and after many attempts to fix this bug i decided to install node and npm new. This time without having to sudo: Node.js installation

I use zsh and had to make small modifications for the second one (only-git-all-the-way.sh) :

echo 'export PATH=$HOME/node/:$PATH' >> ~/.zshrc.local
. ~/.zshrc.local

Elementary OS

I replaced my MacOS X Development Environment with the Linux Distribution Elementary OS. Elementary OS looks very clean and well build.

Elementary OS elementary OS is a free replacement for Windows on the PC and OS X on the Mac.
